verses.verse: At that <S%H6256>time<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H6458>me,<s%> "Cut <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H3871>tables<s%> of <S%H68>stone<s%> like the <S%H7223>first,<s%> and come <S%H5927>up<s%> to me onto the <S%H2022>mountain,<s%> and <S%H6213>make<s%> an <S%H727>ark<s%> of <S%H6086>wood.<s%>

I will <S%H3789>write<s%> on the <S%H3871>tables<s%> the <S%H1697>words<s%> that were on the <S%H7223>first<s%> <S%H3871>tables<s%> which you <S%H7665>broke,<s%> and you shall <S%H7760>put<s%> them in the <S%H727>ark.<s%>"

So I <S%H6213>made<s%> an <S%H727>ark<s%> of <S%H7848>acacia<s%> <S%H6086>wood,<s%> and <S%H6458>cut<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H3871>tables<s%> of <S%H68>stone<s%> like the <S%H7223>first,<s%> and went <S%H5927>up<s%> onto the <S%H2022>mountain,<s%> having the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H3871>tables<s%> in my <S%H3027>hand.<s%>

He <S%H3789>wrote<s%> on the <S%H3871>tables,<s%> according to the <S%H7223>first<s%> <S%H4385>writing,<s%> the <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H1697>commandments,<s%> which <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to you on the <S%H2022>mountain<s%> out of the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of the <S%H784>fire<s%> in the <S%H3117>day<s%> of the <S%H6951>assembly:<s%> and <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> gave them to <S%H5414>me.<s%>

I <S%H6437>turned<s%> and came <S%H3381>down<s%> from the <S%H2022>mountain,<s%> and <S%H7760>put<s%> the <S%H3871>tables<s%> in the <S%H727>ark<s%> which I had <S%H6213>made;<s%> and there they are as <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> commanded <S%H6680>me.<s%>

(The <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H5265>traveled<s%> from Beeroth Bene <S%H885>Jaakan<s%> to <S%H4149>Moserah.<s%> There <S%H175>Aaron<s%> <S%H4191>died,<s%> and there he was <S%H6912>buried;<s%> and <S%H499>Eleazar<s%> his <S%H1121>son<s%> ministered in the <S%H3547>priest<s%>'s office in his place.
From there they <S%H5265>traveled<s%> to <S%H1412>Gudgodah;<s%> and from <S%H1412>Gudgodah<s%> to <S%H3193>Jotbathah,<s%> a <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H5158>brooks<s%> of <S%H4325>water.<s%>

At that <S%H6256>time<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> set <S%H914>apart<s%> the <S%H7626>tribe<s%> of <S%H3878>Levi,<s%> to <S%H5375>bear<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H1285>covenant<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> to <S%H5975>stand<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> to <S%H8334>minister<s%> to <S%H1288>him,<s%> and to bless in his <S%H8034>name,<s%> to this <S%H3117>day.<s%>

Therefore <S%H3878>Levi<s%> has no <S%H2506>portion<s%> nor <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> with his <S%H251>brothers;<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> is his <S%H5159>inheritance,<s%> according as <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> spoke to <S%H1696>him.<s%>)

I <S%H5975>stayed<s%> on the <S%H2022>mountain,<s%> as at the <S%H7223>first<s%> <S%H3117>time,<s%> <S%H705>forty<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> and <S%H705>forty<s%> <S%H3915>nights:<s%> and <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H8085>listened<s%> to me that <S%H6471>time<s%> <S%H3068>also;<s%> Yahweh <S%H14>would<s%> not destroy <S%H7843>you.<s%>

<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H6965>me,<s%> "Arise, <S%H3212>take<s%> your <S%H4550>journey<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H5971>people;<s%> and they shall go <S%H935>in<s%> and <S%H3423>possess<s%> the <S%H776>land,<s%> which I <S%H7650>swore<s%> to their <S%H1>fathers<s%> to give to <S%H5414>them.<s%>"

<S%H3478>Now,<s%> Israel, what does <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H7592>require<s%> of <S%H3372>you,<s%> but to fear <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God,<s%> to <S%H3212>walk<s%> in all his <S%H1870>ways,<s%> and to <S%H157>love<s%> <S%H5647>him,<s%> and to serve <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> with all your <S%H3824>heart<s%> and with all your <S%H5315>soul,<s%>
to <S%H8104>keep<s%> the <S%H4687>commandments<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> and his <S%H2708>statutes,<s%> which I <S%H6680>command<s%> you this <S%H3117>day<s%> for your <S%H2896>good?<s%>
<S%H3068>Behold,<s%> to Yahweh your <S%H430>God<s%> belongs <S%H8064>heaven<s%> and the <S%H8064>heaven<s%> of <S%H8064>heavens,<s%> the <S%H776>earth,<s%> with all that is therein.

Only <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> had a <S%H2836>delight<s%> in your <S%H1>fathers<s%> to <S%H157>love<s%> <S%H977>them,<s%> and he chose their <S%H2233>seed<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H5971>them,<s%> even you above all peoples, as at this <S%H3117>day.<s%>
<S%H4135>Circumcise<s%> therefore the <S%H6190>foreskin<s%> of your <S%H3824>heart,<s%> and be no more <S%H6203>stiff-necked.<s%>

For <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God,<s%> he is <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H430>gods,<s%> and <S%H113>Lord<s%> of <S%H113>lords,<s%> the <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H410>God,<s%> the <S%H1368>mighty,<s%> and the <S%H3372>awesome,<s%> who <S%H5375>doesn't<s%> respect <S%H6440>persons,<s%> nor <S%H3947>takes<s%> <S%H7810>reward.<s%>

He does <S%H6213>execute<s%> <S%H4941>justice<s%> for the <S%H3490>fatherless<s%> and <S%H490>widow,<s%> and <S%H157>loves<s%> the <S%H1616>foreigner,<s%> in <S%H5414>giving<s%> him <S%H3899>food<s%> and <S%H8071>clothing.<s%>
Therefore <S%H157>love<s%> the <S%H1616>foreigner;<s%> for you were <S%H1616>foreigners<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt.<s%>

You shall <S%H3372>fear<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God;<s%> you shall <S%H5647>serve<s%> <S%H1692>him;<s%> and you shall cling to <S%H7650>him,<s%> and you shall swear by his <S%H8034>name.<s%>

He is your <S%H8416>praise,<s%> and he is your <S%H430>God,<s%> who has <S%H6213>done<s%> for you these <S%H1419>great<s%> and awesome <S%H3372>things,<s%> which your <S%H5869>eyes<s%> have <S%H7200>seen.<s%>

Your <S%H1>fathers<s%> went <S%H3381>down<s%> into <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> with <S%H7657>seventy<s%> <S%H5315>persons;<s%> and now <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> has <S%H7760>made<s%> you as the <S%H3556>stars<s%> of the <S%H8064>sky<s%> for <S%H7230>multitude.<s%>
